page.title: 15Waddingham Village Hall(cont
page.content:
{Result of Survey
Of 32 people questioned 28 said that they used the hall.
4 went there more than once a week. 7 went there about once a week. 8 went there about once a month. 9 people used the hall less frequently The four people who said they did not go to the hall gave the following reasons One said," I don't like it." Two said," There is nothing there to interest me." One person said,"I don't know." From the survey we conclude that the hall is used by most people in the area. The hall is also used as a doctor's surgery.
